definition: perspiration/sweat/CL:滴[di1],頭|头[tou2],身[shen1]/to be speechless (out of helplessness, embarrassment etc) (Internet slang used as an interjection)
see 可汗[ke4 han2], 汗國|汗国[han2 guo2]

sentences.english: His face was sallow and shiny with sweat.
Sweat poured down from her face.
sentences.chinese: 汗珠不断地从她的脸上流下。
他的额头上伸出了汗珠。

sentences.english: I heard the sweat from my face hit the wooden floors.
sentences.chinese: 汗珠从我的脸上滑落下来，滴在了木地板上。

sentences.english: With pearly sweat resembling dew of night.
sentences.chinese: 手上的点点汗珠，像夜晚花间的露水。

sentences.english: SWEAT】The old farmer wiped the sweat off his brow.
sentences.chinese: 那老农夫擦去额上的汗珠。

sentences.english: He passed his hand across his forehead. It was dank with clammy sweat.
sentences.chinese: 他用手抹抹前额，额上满是湿漉漉粘糊糊的汗珠。

sentences.english: His face was beaded with sweat.
Only with sweats can you harvest happiness.
sentences.chinese: 只有抛洒汗珠颗颗，才能收获欢乐阵阵。

sentences.english: Bertuccio's forehead was covered with perspiration .
sentences.chinese: 伯都西奥的前额上满是汗珠。

sentences.english: The sun was at its fiercest and beads of sweat kept rolling down his face.
sentences.chinese: 那时太阳正毒，晒得他汗珠直往下滚。

sentences.english: He has lithiasis, and the violent pain makes him sweat.
sentences.chinese: 他患有结石病，一病发就疼得汗珠直淌。

sentences.english: The blue jade put on the sweat bead of putting on the forehead, Pie Pie mouth way.
sentences.chinese: 蓝玉抹了抹额头的汗珠，撇了撇嘴道。

sentences.english: Paul saw drops of sweat fall from his father's brow.
sentences.chinese: 保罗看见父亲额头汗珠涔涔。
成串的汗珠挂在他的脸上。

sentences.english: Most of the men's backs were bared and glistening with sweat.
sentences.chinese: 大多数男人们光着脊梁，汗珠晶晶发亮。

definition: to let drip/to trickle down/to shed (tears)
perspiration/sweat/CL:滴[di1],頭|头[tou2],身[shen1]/to be speechless (out of helplessness, embarrassment etc) (Internet slang used as an interjection)
see 可汗[ke4 han2], 汗國|汗国[han2 guo2]
